html:
1.10.22  1:47 pm   why did the cops take you to jail for being friends with your own front door?

      that wasn't me, but it was written that way for heightening purposes

1.10.22  1:12 pm   Do you like throwing waffles at passing vehicles?

      how about throwing vehicles at passing waffles

1.10.22  11:32 am   what makes life worth living?

      you

1.10.22  8:23 am   How do you think of your own music?

      sometimes i get very scared

1.10.22  7:10 am   how do you feel when people tell you stories about what your art means to them? does it ever feel creepy vs. endearing?

      it's what i want, so how could i complain really

1.10.22  6:56 am   do you have nightmares 

      it's me, i'm the nightmare

1.10.22  3:04 am   what is infinity?

      normal

1.10.22  12:55 am   If love will save the world, isn't it best communicated in a language other than English? How about every language?

      every, or any

1.9.22  11:31 pm   Hi, Bill. Yesterday I asked you what happened at the end of the book-stacking video. I understand your answer but I'm still confused. Why did you seem so surprised at the end of the video? (BTW, I really enjoy your content!)

      i suppose maybe i was just then realizing the gravity of what i had just done

1.9.22  10:07 pm   what is the worst idea you've ever had?

     common sense

     
conversely, what is the best idea you've ever had?

      common sense

1.9.22  10:05 pm   why is my drawing so messy

      because it's too good

1.9.22  10:01 pm   i'm thinking about breaking some rules, which do you recommend?

      how about the golden rule

1.9.22  9:39 pm   how do you explain nothing to someone

      don't do anything

1.9.22  8:21 pm   in your opinion, what is the most exciting hue of purple?

      it depends what colors are next to it

1.9.22  6:30 pm   why do I have hands?

      to hold fruit, etc

1.9.22  5:24 pm   why are sitcom dads so fucking stupid

      to be a role model, for the whole family, and for the entire production crew and the viewing audience

1.9.22  4:13 pm   is your "weirdness" your way of telling certain stuff that only certain people could understand?

      my goal is to express things that everyone can understand

1.9.22  3:56 pm   do you know the etymology of "hallelujah" without looking it up?

      no, but my first guess is that no one knows

1.9.22  12:43 pm   what should i do right now

      check on the status quo to see if it is being maintained, and if not then maintain it

1.9.22  6:27 am   Why is garlic bread not made out of garlic?

      i think it has garlic on it

1.9.22  1:35 am   Why do you misspell things on the website

      for artistic purposes

1.8.22  11:12 pm   what's the matter with me?

      you're too good

1.8.22  10:06 pm   when will i learn my lesson?

      it's multi-lesson

1.8.22  7:14 pm   What happened at the end of your book-stacking video when you said you were gonna go to a commercial break?

      i ended the video, and probably contemplated the degree to which it did or did not fulfill me

1.8.22  4:56 pm   Damien Maymdien never answered our question of why everything is dumb and stupid.

      in that case, maybe it's not true

1.8.22  4:32 pm   do you think sometimes

      yes

1.8.22  3:24 pm   in "la de da de da de da de day oh", is the mall verse a metaphor or some hidden symbolism?

     for me it's a reference to that one time i went to the mall and i noticed that most of the stores had closed down...... and yet, there was no news about the mall closing. on some emotional level i felt that slight apocalyptic tingle. it felt like the perfect thing to invoke there in the second verse, in such a cheerful song

     what's the theme in that song?

      music, good and bad times, joy, self expression, and understanding

1.8.22  1:07 pm   have you ever ABSOLUTELY FLIP YOUR SHIT

      mostly

1.8.22  12:32 pm   What is time?

      it's you

1.8.22  8:32 am   How to pay attention 

      to what

1.8.22  6:39 am   Do you have a favourite pair of socks?

      no

1.8.22  5:45 am   What's your favorite quote?

      "What's your favorite quote?"

1.8.22  5:22 am   how do i turn the whole world into a cult

      you'll need a good slogan

1.8.22  4:07 am   i have a knock knock joke but you have to start it

      ok i will

1.8.22  3:20 am   favourite chord featuring a sharp note?

      D

1.8.22  2:07 am   how do i say a speech confidently?

      somehow, you're going to have to make friends with your audience. an alternate option i suppose is to become enemies with your audience. one way or another, you're gonna probably have to develop a relationship to your audience

1.7.22  11:52 pm   How come if you make music you are an artist but if you make silence you are not an artist?

      silence makers are artists, especially if they are deliberate in their contextual placement of the silence

1.7.22  9:32 pm   It's often said that, personality bleeds into the work of people. Would you say that this is true for your songs/videos and you?

      yes

1.7.22  7:52 pm   should i graduate and start working or graduate and keep learning

      graduate from what / working on what / learning what .......... 3 variables in this equation... hard to solve without knowing any of those whats

1.7.22  6:50 pm   does using bII the 'old-fashioned' bach-ish way appeal to you (something like Db/F - G7 - Cm)

      that sounds fine with me

1.7.22  6:50 pm   thoughts on geese

      too unique. maybe they could tone it down a little

1.7.22  6:24 pm   can i learn music without a teacher

     music itself is a teacher. music not only teaches music, but it can teach you many more things about the rollercoaster of emotion and spirit that we all must face

     and where do you start and get inspiration and ideas

     everything is an idea. even a speck of lint. damn maybe i shouldn't have given that one away

     i feel like everything ever has already been done

     everyone has always thought that, including all the people who did any of the things that had been done before that

     and i'm stuck

     try a little reverse psychology. start out by trying to do something wrong on purpose. sometimes that's the only way to open the door. but when it does open, it's an infinite door so watch out

1.7.22  5:45 pm   how to tune a drum kit? i spent like 2 hours today and i cant get it to sound good

      if you haven't tried any muffling, you could try that. it will probably sound like crap before you do that. try taping some soft objects to the heads

1.7.22  5:22 pm   What should I do if I feel like I'm too cool for the outside world?

      do something cooler than anyone outside has ever done

1.7.22  5:11 pm   what is everything?

      another version of you

1.7.22  5:04 pm   how many wpm can you type

      Saturday, January 8, 2022 3:16:47 PM i'm not sure, but hopefully i can demonstrate this by typing an interesting anecdote about a hummingbird who met a family of other hummingbirds, and over time was gradually assimilated into this new family of hummingbirds. it's a good thing i pre-composed this passage in advance, because it took me about 10 seconds to figure out how to spell anecdote, and also the composition took some additional time. But this final transcription is being typed in real time, and you can see the exact time it took by taking the difference of the time between the time stamps. i should mention that i might be a bit slower than normal because my fingernails need cutting and also my hands are a bit cold.Saturday, January 8, 2022 3:18:08 PM

1.7.22  4:12 pm   Do you edit videos on your table

      i do it on a desk

1.7.22  2:36 pm   Are you going to release an album of your best hits?

      no

1.7.22  9:48 am   How long did the video part of more than a dream take to make?

      much less time than usual, but still way too long. this was mostly because of some early experiments i did in an attempt to make it take only 2 days, and i failed that experiment continuously for a few times, and then after that struggle, the clouds somehow lifted and i was able to breeze through the rest of it

1.7.22  9:24 am   why didn't the rooster cross the road?

      didn't need to. all his destinations were on the same side
